full_summary:
### Solicitation: Remotely Piloted Aircraft System (RPAS) 

**Reference Number:** cb-511-19138081
**Amendment Number:** 6
**Solicitation Number:** 202302886/A

**Publication Date:** 2023-11-23
**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-03-04T17:00:00 (Expired)

**Description:**
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) requires a Remotely Piloted Aircraft System (RPAS) with an option to purchase additional units within two years of contract award. The RPAS must be supplied with accessories and be capable of receiving all deliverables within ten weeks of contract award.

**Scope of Work:**
The contractor must provide one (1) DJI Matrice 30T RPAS and associated accessories, or equivalent, with an option to purchase up to ten (10) additional units within two years of contract award.

**Selection Criteria:**
The lowest-priced compliant proposal will be selected.

**Submission:**
Tenders must be submitted to the RCMP Bid Receiving Unit.

**Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP):**
This solicitation is available on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) at [www.canadabuys.canada.ca](http://www.canadabuys.canada.ca).

**Confidentiality:**
Canada retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement.

**Language:**
Tenders may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Integrity Regime:**
The RCMP has adopted the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada.

**Document Accessibility:**
The solicitation documents and attachments may be accessed through the GETS.

**Contracting Entity:**
RCMP E Division

**Contract Award Date:**
The expected contract start date is 2024-03-01, with an expected end date of 2026-02-27.

**Trade Agreements:**
The procurement is subject to various trade agreements, including the World Trade Organization (WTO) Agreement on Government Procurement and the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement.

**Contact Information:**
For any inquiry or consultation, please contact: Gursharn Dhadwal
Phone: (778) 290-2774
Email: [GURSHARN.DHADWAL@RCMP-GRC.GC.CA](mailto:GURSHARN.DHADWAL@RCMP-GRC.GC
